name: The Time Keeper (HamsterCoder)
description:
For the brackeys game jam 2020.2

Story:

You wer called out by the time keeper to be the next. Use your time gun to rewind all the time fragments to what they were. The more time fragments you patch, the more score you get. Rewind objects to make your way throughout the path.

GamePlay:

Move with the W A S D keys, use the mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

This game was made in 1 to 2 days due to the lack of knowledge of the game jam. Hope you enjoy :)
